radiographic_examinations.findings: Multiple enhancing lesions, measuring 1 cm or less, consistent with hemangioblastomas of the cerebellum and cervical spinal cord.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: No change in the size of the optic nerve head hemangioblastoma or visual function parameters.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Multiple calcified pancreatic cysts and a 1-cm right renal cyst.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: No other changes were noted in her cerebellar, spinal, or pancreatic lesions.
